name: Atychiphobia (Spag's Space)
description:
Atychiphobia - Fear of failure

You play as a college dropout who is finding healing by diving into his past. You can explore up to 4 different rooms that lie deep within his mind and battle the inner demons as his favourite childhood hero. Fight your way through the enemies that threaten to eat away at his anxiety!

Controls: A - Left D - Right Space - Jump / Double jump Left mouse button - Fire bullets

This game was made by:

Spags - Programming, sound and level design

Guizuzu - Character, UI and animation

Pentragon - Environment, menu and cutscenes
